name: Extra Holidays
description: Tired of manually adding common holidays to the calendar? This mod will make some more of them appear by default.

pages.title: Details
pages.html:
Important Notice

Unfortunately, I have discovered some problems with this mod, and have cancelled the beta phase and its planned public release. Please read this public post on Patreon for more information. I am actively looking into ways to fix this problem, so check back on this page soon.

Summary

This mod adds "Spookyfest" and "Flower Day" holidays to the calendar. That's it, ta-da ðŸŽ‰.

You can pick and choose which holidays you want to install, and even rename them with the HolidayNames.cfg file.

Spookyfest

Spookyfest occurs during Fall, and does not come with a day off of work and school.

Schedule

  • 7 day seasons → Monday of week 1
  • 14 day seasons → Friday of week 1
  • 28 day seasons → Friday of week 3

Flower Day

Flower Day occurs during Spring, and is observed by a day off of work and school on Mondays.

Schedule

  • 7 day seasons → Monday of week 1
  • 14 day seasons → Monday of week 1
  • 28 day seasons → Monday of week 2

Though it is based on Easter, Monday was chosen instead of Sunday because (1) Sunday holidays do not work when you start in that season, (2) being on Sunday would put Flower Day on New Year's Day, and (3) this way you can have the day after off of work and school.
